name: Slow Cooked Chicken Tacos with Beans and Corn
ingredients: 4 frozen chicken breasts 1 cup brown sugar
steps: Salsa (about 1 cup per breast) (For creamier texture, add 1 block of cream cheese)
Spray crock pot with Pam. Layer chicken, salsa, cream cheese (if you want it) and sugar in crock pot. Cook
for 4-­‐5 hours on low. Shred chicken and return to salsa to serve.
Combine beans with a little juice from them with an equal amount corn. Add cumin and stir. Microwave
about 5 minutes or until hot. This can also be done over the stove.
Serve tacos with chicken, black beans and corn, sour cream, avocado, and cilantro.
*This recipe is great for really large groups. I fed all the Young Women (about 26 people) with only one bag
